name: Orders without products
description: There might appear some empty orders in GA. To avoid empty orders, it will help to reflect anomalies that users have during their ordering process. Without it, the website will not make any difference between an order with products, and empty orders.

blocks.description: Test checks orders, if some empty order is found, it fails.
blocks.passMessage: There are no orders without products.
blocks.failHowtofix: Shows table with Ids of orders that has been detected as empty.
blocks.failTableDescribe: Sample of up to 10 orders without products
